blogPost.excerpt: Appect is a magical landing page builder for mobile app owners that converts store links into landing pages in a seconds. You can create unlimited landing pages by picking from our beautifully crafted themes, track visitors and downloads and collect feedback!
blogPost.body: Appect is a magical landing page builder for mobile app owners that converts store links into landing pages in a seconds. You can create unlimited landing pages by picking from our beautifully crafted themes, track visitors and downloads and collect feedback!
blogPost.title: Appect - Turn your store link into a cool landing page in seconds
blogPost.author: Anıl Kıral

localize.description: Appect是一个神奇的登陆页面生成器，为移动应用程序所有者，在几秒钟内将商店链接转换为登陆页面。您可以从我们精美的主题中选择创建无限的着陆页，跟踪访问者和下载，并收集反馈意见!
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将您的商店链接变成一个很酷的登陆页面。

localize.description: Appect是一個神奇的登陸頁面生成器，爲移動應用程序所有者，在幾秒鐘內將商店鏈接轉換爲登陸頁面。您可以從我們精美的主題中選擇創建無限的着陸頁，跟蹤訪問者和下載，並收集反饋意見!
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將您的商店鏈接變成一個很酷的登陸頁面。

previous.excerpt: Explo lets you build customer-facing dashboards that fit seamlessly into your existing application. Connect directly to your database or warehouse, build custom-styled dashboards, and embed in your application within a day.
previous.title: Explo 2.0 - Customer-facing dashboards and reports - lightning fast

localize.description: Explo可以让您建立面向客户的仪表盘，并无缝地嵌入到您现有的应用程序中。直接连接到您的数据库或仓库，建立自定义风格的仪表盘，并在一天内嵌入您的应用程序。
localize.tagline: 面向客户的仪表盘和报告--快如闪电。

localize.description: Explo可以讓您建立面向客戶的儀表盤，並無縫地嵌入到您現有的應用程序中。直接連接到您的數據庫或倉庫，建立自定義風格的儀表盤，並在一天內嵌入您的應用程序。
localize.tagline: 面向客戶的儀表盤和報告--快如閃電。

next.excerpt: A bot who helps to monitor Elon's twitter and notify you instantly via Discord app. You no longer have to keep refreshing on his twitter, or mess up your twitter notifications to just follow him.
next.title: Trade on Elon Tweets - Never missed any tweet, go buying before everyone knows.

localize.description: 一个帮助监控Elon的twitter并通过Discord应用即时通知你的机器人。你再也不用不停地刷新他的微博，也不用为了关注他而搞乱你的微博通知了。
localize.tagline: 从来没有错过任何一条微博，趁大家还没知道，赶紧去买吧。

localize.description: 一個幫助監控Elon的twitter並通過Discord應用即時通知你的機器人。你再也不用不停地刷新他的微博，也不用爲了關注他而搞亂你的微博通知了。
localize.tagline: 從來沒有錯過任何一條微博，趁大家還沒知道，趕緊去買吧。
